sense.gloss: to carry to extremes, to go to the end of something, to reach the limits of something
to reach the peak of something (e.g. luxury, hardships, etc), to be extremely (e.g. busy)
to investigate thoroughly, to research thoroughly, to master, to understand completely
to exhaust completely, to have nothing left (e.g. to say)

sdata.j: ↑善悪↑↓ぜんあく↓を↑見|極↑↓みきわ↓める|ことは↑難↑↓むずか↓しい。
sdata.e: To distinguish right from wrong is difficult.

sdata.j: ↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑運動↑↓うんどう↓↑選手↑↓せんしゅ↓は↑青年↑↓せいねん↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓に↑盛↑↓さか↓りを|↑極↑↓きわ↓める|。
sdata.e: Most athletes are at their best during their early manhood.

sdata.j: フランス↑語↑↓ご↓を|↑極↑↓きわ↓める|のは↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓ではない。
